other_tests.findings: Decreased inspiratory lung volumes, increased opacification at the bilateral lung bases with obscuration of the hemidiaphragm on the left greater than the right consistent with small bilateral pleural effusions, underlying atelectasis. No pneumothorax is present.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The cardiac silhouette is incompletely assessed but overall unchanged. The mediastinal and hilar contours are within normal limits.
